attr.title: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball
attr.desc: A video game that crosses the tried-and-true gameplay of Pong with the competitive frenzy of foosball. Billed as the world's first 'sportslike', tongue firmly planted in cheek.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings -- download the Android version, place the apk in dudelingsarcadesportsball/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings](https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings) -- download the Android version, place the apk in `dudelingsarcadesportsball/gamedata`
